description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on 2nd of May 2023. All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of the Department of National Defence  is issuing this  request for proposal for the acquisition of various professional kitchen equipment for the Camp Vimy kitchen, including delivery at the Support Base in Valcartier, Qu\u00e9bec, as detailed in Annex A.
